metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14670 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incorrect configuration in deb package in ClickHouse before 1.1.54131 could lead to unauthorized use of the database.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

clickhouse-client - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-common - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-server - 18.16.1+ds-7
clickhouse-tools - 18.16.1+ds-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.16.1+ds-7').
